title: (x) Pink "Floyd Money" single sleeve - Baby Teeth {Jan}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130103011042im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Money_1973_5397.jpg)
  
I'm searching for the font used for **MONEY**.  
Any idea?

Thanks in advance!
author: tacyiex

comments.content: Baby Teeth by Milton Glaser. As far as I know still not available in digital form.

Thank you very much!  
(I knew it was famous.)
Wow, I'd never seen the sleeve for this single before!

Bebit is the only professional digital version I know. Where's Stephen with his list?

- Lex

But if you click on the sample, it seems to have Latin as well.

- Lex
